summary: A Gainesville Florida auto upholsterer (Giamatti) attempts to subvert his mundane life by training a wild, red-tailed hawk.
cast: Paul Giamatti|Michelle Williams|Michael Pitt|Rusty Schwimmer|Robert Wisdom|Ann Wedgeworth|Mark Campbell|Ayana Rhoden|Taylor Simpson|John Hostetter|Steve DuMouchel|Katie Dixon|Veryl Jones|Karl Anthony|Marc Macaulay|Bob Lipka|P.J. Lalka|Erika Medina|Matthew Stanton|Safari|Dre|Kermit|Shamrock McShane|Shelby Saboy|Dean Weathers
title: The Hawk Is Dying
